name: thousand-arrows
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Grounds the target until it leaves battle. Ignores levitation effects and the immunity of flying-type Pokémon.
short_effect: Grounds the target, and hits even Flying-type or levitating Pokémon.
flavor_text: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.
